content: Hey all! I started working on this issue which is related to RFC 2008 non_exhaustive structs and enums. I'm adding a lint to warn on missing reachable patterns of non_exhaustive structs/enums. Which stream would be the best place to start a new topic?

I'm probably giving the wrong directions :) but you can try #t-compiler/help or #t-compiler/help-wanted
In case it's not a big deal - you will be redirected to the right stream
also, if you want I think you can claim the issue to signal that you're working on it (@rustbot claim)
